channel.title: Help with an item error?
channel.description:
Hey everyone, this is my first post on MoparScape. Unfornately, it is under the "Help" section. Anyway, I was buffing/nerfing some weapons in the items.cfg file from the XENON source (http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,662648.0.html). When I was finished, I compiled it like normal and when I tried to run the server, I get this error:
[code=java5]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17 at server.world.ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:377) at server.world.ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:34) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:67) Press any key to continue . . . [/code]
Any help would be appreciated.
EDIT: Fixed the issue, ignore this post

item.title: Help with an item error?
item.dc:creator: @wildskiller wildskiller
item.description:
@wildskiller wrote:

Learn a thing or two about arrays. It’s saying that the specified index (17) is out of it’s bounds. Basically, the index is greater than the size of the array.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with an item error?

item.description:
